articles.author: Msnbc
articles.title: Ukrainian jet that crashed, killing 176, appears to have been shot by Iranian missiles, sources say
articles.description: U.S. Sources tell NBC News that spy satellite evidence suggests the Ukrainian plane that crashed in Iran was shot down by Iranian missiles, likely accidentally. All 176 souls on board died in the crash.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Rep. Brown endorses Pete Buttigieg for his 'forward-looking approach'
articles.description: Rep. Anthony Brown, D-Md., is the first black member of Congress to endorse Pete Buttigieg's 2020 presidential bid. He chose Buttigieg because of his "forward-looking approach" to the issues.

articles.title: Pelosi: I'll send articles of impeachment to the Senate 'when I'm ready'
articles.description: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, D-Calif., stood by her decision to withhold the articles of impeachment from the Senate but said she would not hold them indefinitely.

articles.title: Following threat, Trump adds to his list of awkward bluffs

articles.title: Joe: Low moment as Lindsey Graham accuses Sen. Lee
articles.description: Top Trump administration officials on Wednesday held two classified briefings about the airstrike last week that killed top Iranian Gen. Qassem Soleimani, and not everyone in the GOP had the same feelings about the strike.
